com.software.reuze

Class ff_MD2Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.software.reuze.ff_MD2Model

  • public class ff_MD2Model
extends Object
    This class keeps track of a md2 model (current frame, current state) etc. While the model data itself is stored in the JDmd2ModelLoader.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ff_MD2Model(ff_MD2Model model)
      The model data is already in memory, so this constructor uses references to this data and doesn't load the model again.
      ff_MD2Model(File meshFile, File skinFile)
      This constructor really loads the model in memory

    • Constructor Detail

      • ff_MD2Model

        public ff_MD2Model(File meshFile,
           File skinFile)
        This constructor really loads the model in memory
        Parameters:
        meshFile - The file containing the meshes.
        skinFile - The file containing the skin texture.

      • ff_MD2Model

        public ff_MD2Model(ff_MD2Model model)
        The model data is already in memory, so this constructor uses references to this data and doesn't load the model again.
        Parameters:
        model - The model to reference.
